name: season_wins_leaderboard_mw_2
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cod_api_2_0.
Tool description: Provides an easy access to the COD api leaderboard endpoints.
API description: Fetches season wins information for a specified number of players on the MW 2 leaderboard.

limit.description: Number of players to fetch the leaderboard information for, ranging from 1 to 2000.

season.description: The season for which to fetch the wins information. Defaults to 's1'.
